resources.string: De Ushuaia a La Caca, Anales de la cartograf√≠a. Made with love by Javier Steinaker, hoping that everyone can find a proper public toilet when in need.

To add a new toilet, move the map to the desired zone (zoom to get more precise) and long press on the exact point in which you want to add it. A new marker with the plus sign will come up, press over it to complete the process. Remember: you have to be registered and logged in to be able to do this.
Login is required to be able to add new markers or edit existent ones.
